All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CalculateGrossSalaryForEmployeeTest
This class contains unit tests for the CalculateGrossSalary method in the PayrollService class.
CalculateNetSalaryAfterDeductions
This class contains unit tests for the CalculateNetSalaryAfterDeductions method in the PayrollService class.
DatabaseConnectionException
Exception thrown when there's an error with the database connection.
DatabaseContext
Utility class for managing database connections.
Employee
Represents an Employee with various properties and methods.
EmployeeNotFoundException
Exception thrown when an employee is not found.
EmployeeService
Implements the IEmployeeService interface to provide functionalities related to employee management.
FinancialRecord
Represents an FinancialRecord with various properties and methods.
FinancialRecordException
Exception thrown when there is an issue with financial records.
FinancialRecordService
Implements the IFinancialRecordService interface to provide functionalities related to financial record management.
IEmployeeService
Interface for managing employee-related operations.
IFinancialRecordService
Interface for managing financial record-related operations.
InvalidInputException
Exception thrown when invalid input is detected.
IPayrollService
Interface for managing payroll-related operations.
ITaxService
Interface for managing tax-related operations.
Payroll
Represents an Payroll with various properties and methods.
PayrollGenerationException
Exception thrown when there is an issue with payroll generation.
PayrollService
Implements the IPayrollService interface to provide functionalities related to payroll management.
ProcessPayrollForMultipleEmployees
Test class to verify the end-to-end payroll processing for a batch of employees.
ReportGenerator
Main class for generating reports and managing employee-related activities.
Tax
Represents an Tax with various properties and methods.
TaxCalculationException
Exception thrown when there is an issue with tax calculation.
TaxService
Implements the ITaxService interface to provide functionalities related to tax management.
VerifyErrorHandlingForInvalidEmployeeData
This class contains a unit test to verify error handling for the case when an invalid employee ID is provided to the GetEmployeeById method.
VerifyTaxCalculationForHighIncomeEmployee
This class contains a unit test to verify tax calculation for a high-income employee in the TaxService class.
